messages.content: You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is a common way to differentiate between non-player characters?
Finding a portrait for each of them.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Where can Keepers find suitable character portraits for their game?
Websites featuring people of the period in which the game is set, such as galleries of film stars.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What can Keepers do if images of non-player characters are not provided?
A quick search on the Internet to find suitable character portraits to print and cut out.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What type of resources can Keepers use to find non-player character portraits?
Published scenarios, drawings or photographs of important non-player characters, and websites featuring people of the period.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What should a Keeper do to find suitable character portraits?
A quick search on the Internet can provide a range of suitable character portraits.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Why should using names appropriate for the place and period increase realism?
Using names appropriate for the place and period gives an increased sense of realism.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is a common name that a Keeper should avoid using for non-player characters?
A common name such as 'Bob'.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Why is it a good idea to make all non-player characters feel equally real?
Fumbling for a name is a sure sign to the players that the character is not central to the plot.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is a sure sign to the players that a character is not central to the plot?
Fumbling for a name
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is an advantage of using names appropriate for the place and period?
An increased sense of realism
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What can happen to non-player characters occasionally in the game?
Be handed over to the players' control
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Where is the owner of the Castle Stahleck referred to?
Alongside the name on the list for future reference
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Who plays the non-player characters in the game?
The players play their investigators, while the Keeper plays the non-player characters.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
When does the Keeper allow the players to take control of the non-player characters?
When a situation presents itself that allows the non-player characters to be handed over to the players' control.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the outcome of the operation decided by the Keeper instead of telling the players?
The players take control of the non-player characters, allowing them to be played by the players for the duration of the mission.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the change of pace provided by playing a non-player character?
A major change of pace, as it contrasts with the role of the investigator, who may be a college professor.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the Keeper's approach to letting the players play members of the SWAT team?
allowing the players to play members of the SWAT team for the duration of the mission
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the role of a simple index card when it comes to non-player characters?
an index card with a name, profession, and a few key characteristics or skills is enough for one scene
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What should be detailed in advance or quickly generated in play for combat scenes?
combat skills, weapons, and hit points
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Why is it easier to improvise around a simple archetype than to portray a fully detailed character?
because it is easier to improvise around a simple archetype than to portray a fully detailed character
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is a simple way to portray a character in a scene?
A simple index card with a name, profession, and a few key characteristics or skills is enough.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What should be detailed in advance for a combat scene?
Combat skills, weapons, and hit points.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens when investigators split up in a roleplaying scenario?
A player may hear about things that are not being perceived through their investigator.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What can be easily overlooked when investigators split up?
Fellow investigators' knowledge of the situation.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What are some key elements that need to be detailed in a combat scene?
combat skills, weapons, and hit points
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the benefit of playing a non-player character?
to 'see' through the eyes of a character and discover things unaware of
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens to the player when investigators split up?
they may hear about things that are not being perceived through his or her investigator
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What does the Keeper give to the players in a conflict situation?
pick-up non-player characters to play
